name: Escape From the Nonspecific Military Facility
name_original: Escape From the Nonspecific Military Facility
description:
Full Title: Escape From the Nonspecific Military Facility or: The Culmination of a Series of Increasingly Poor Time Management Desicions.

You are  an alien held in a nonspecific military facility and you want to escape. You must accomplish this using the arrow keys and Z.

Made for the old tool jam in gamemaker 4.0 from 2001, which was a really poor engine choice, as it isn't old enough to give games made with it a retro vibe, they just look bad. I discovered this the hard way and wound up restarting five times during the jam due to it's limitations making most of my ideas almost impossible. That's why the game's so short, I didn't have a lot of time to work on it.
